title: Session details information

xdm:id.title: Series id
xdm:id.description: The series id the show belongs to.

xdm:name.title: Content name
xdm:name.description: The friendly, human-readable name of the timed media asset.

xdm:length.title: Media content length
xdm:length.description: Length of primary media asset in seconds.

xdm:contentType.title: Broadcast content type
xdm:contentType.description: The type of the stream delivery.

meta:enum.Linear: Linear playback of the media asset

xdm:channel.title: Content channel
xdm:channel.description: Distribution channel from where the content was played.

xdm:sdkVersion.title: Version
xdm:sdkVersion.description: The version identifier of the API, e.g h.18.

xdm:assetId.title: Asset ID
xdm:assetId.description: Identifier of the content, which can be used to tie back to other industry or CMS IDs.

xdm:genre.title: Genre
xdm:genre.description: Type or grouping of content as defined by content producer.

xdm:firstAirDate.title: First air date
xdm:firstAirDate.description: The date when the content first aired on television.

xdm:firstDigitalDate.title: First digital date
xdm:firstDigitalDate.description: The date when the content first aired on any digital channel or platform.

xdm:rating.title: Rating Value
xdm:rating.description: Rating value as issued by the rating source.

xdm:showType.title: Show type
xdm:showType.description: The type of content for example, trailer or full episode.

xdm:adLoad.title: Ad load type
xdm:adLoad.description: The type of ad loaded as defined by each customer's internal representation.

xdm:mvpd.title: MVPD Identifier
xdm:mvpd.description: The MVPD (Multichannel Video Programming Distributor) provided via authentication. [https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=MVPD]

xdm:auth.title: Media authorized
xdm:auth.description: The user has been authorized via authentication.

xdm:dayPart.title: Day part
xdm:dayPart.description: Defines the time of the day when the content was broadcast or played.

xdm:feed.title: Feed type
xdm:feed.description: The type of feed, which can either represent actual feed-related data such as  EAST HD or SD, or the source of the feed like a URL.

xdm:streamFormat.title: Stream format
xdm:streamFormat.description: Free-form format of the stream for example, short or long.

xdm:resume.title: Resume
xdm:resume.description: Marks each playback that was resumed after more than 30 minutes of buffer, pause, or stall period.

xdm:streamType.title: Stream type
xdm:streamType.description: The type of the media stream

xdm:artist.title: Artist
xdm:artist.description: The name of the album artist or group performing the music recording or video.

xdm:album.title: Album
xdm:album.description: The name of the album that the music recording or video belongs to.

xdm:station.title: Radio station
xdm:station.description: The radio station name on which the audio is played.

xdm:publisher.title: Publisher
xdm:publisher.description: Name of the audio content publisher.

xdm:segment.title: Video segment
xdm:segment.description: The interval that describes the part of the content that has been viewed in minutes.

xdm:isDownloaded.title: Media downloaded flag
xdm:isDownloaded.description: The stream was played locally on the device after being downloaded.

xdm:isFederated.title: Federated Data
xdm:isFederated.description: Set to true when the hit is federated (i.e., received by the customer as part of a federated data share, rather than their own implementation).

xdm:view.title: Media Starts
xdm:view.description: Load event for the media. (This occurs when the viewer clicks the Play button). This would count even if there are pre-roll ads, buffering, errors, and so on.

xdm:play.title: Content starts
xdm:play.description: First frame of media is consumed. If the user drops during ad, buffering, etc., then there would be no “Content Start” event.

xdm:dropBeforeStarts.title: Drop Before start
xdm:dropBeforeStarts.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

xdm:complete.title: Content completes
xdm:complete.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion, this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Content Time Spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Sums the event duration (in seconds) for all events of type PLAY on the main content. The value will be displayed in the time format (HH:MM:SS) in Analysis Workspace and Reports & Analytics. In Data Feeds, Data Warehouse, and Reporting APIs the values will be displayed in seconds.

xdm:totalTimePlayed.title: Media Time Spent
xdm:totalTimePlayed.description: Describes the total amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset, which includes time spent watching ads.

xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.title: Unique Time Played
xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.description: Describes the sum of the unique intervals seen by a user on a timed media asset - i.e. the length playback intervals viewed multiple times are only counted once.

xdm:averageMinuteAudience.title: Average Minute Audience
xdm:averageMinuteAudience.description: Describes the average content time spent for a specific media item - i.e. the total content time spent divided by the length for all of the playback sessions.

xdm:adCount.title: Ad count
xdm:adCount.description: The number of ads started during the playback.

xdm:chapterCount.title: Chapter count
xdm:chapterCount.description: The number of chapters started during the playback.

xdm:progress10.title: 10% Progress marker
xdm:progress10.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 10% marker of media based on stream length. The marker is only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress25.title: 25% Progress marker
xdm:progress25.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 25% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress50.title: 50% Progress marker
xdm:progress50.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 50% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress75.title: 75% Progress marker
xdm:progress75.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 75% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress95.title: 95% Progress marker
xdm:progress95.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 95% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:estimatedStreams.title: Estimated streams
xdm:estimatedStreams.description: The estimated number of video or audio streams per each individual content.

xdm:pause.title: Pause impacted streams
xdm:pause.description: Indicates if one or more pauses occurred during the playback of a single media item.

xdm:pauseCount.title: Pause events
xdm:pauseCount.description: The number of pause periods that occurred during playback.

xdm:pauseTime.title: Total pause duration
xdm:pauseTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which playback was paused by the user.

xdm:segmentView.title: Media segment views
xdm:segmentView.description: Indicates when at least one frame, not necessarily the first has been viewed.

xdm:secondsSinceLastCall.title: Media session server timeout
xdm:secondsSinceLastCall.description: Indicates the amount of time, in seconds, that passed between the user's last known interaction and the moment the session was closed.
